description: Number of walks on square lattice.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: R. K. Guy, Catwalks, sandsteps and Pascal pyramids, J. Integer Sequences, Vol. 3 (2000), Article #00.1.6
formula: a(n) = C(n+5, ceil(n/2))*C(n+4, floor(n/2)) - C(n+5, ceil((n-1)/2))*C(n+4, floor((n-1)/2)). - _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 16 2004
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
